description: Mobile techniques used by PJApps, ATT&CK software S0291 v1.1
name: PJApps (S0291)

techniques.comment: PJApps has the capability to collect and leak the victim's location.[1]
PJApps has the capability to send messages to premium SMS messages.[1]
PJApps has the capability to collect and leak the victim's phone number, mobile device unique identifier (IMEI).[1]
